alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Westchester and Rockland Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tarrytown, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Plains, New City, Ossining, Peekskill, Haverstraw, Tarrytown, Dobbs Ferry, Nyack, Tappan, Harrison, Scarsdale, Hawthorne, Orangeburg, Pomona and Upper Nyack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
